name: Post-jam update for Paint Fast
description:
This is a very small post-jam update of Paint Fast, a jam game I made in 48 hours for the 42nd gm(48) game jam.

Original submission: https://gm48.net/game/2025/paint-fast

Changes from the original version:

  • Fixed a couple of bugs with the paint-closing mechanic.
  • Added a button (R) to start over at any point during gameplay.

This version is connected to the same online leaderboard as the original version.

Credits:

  • Riuku (everything except music)
  • Reaktori (music)
